title: Tambow
description: A hugely appealing story about the adventures of two wombats, Wombi and her son Tambow, kept as curiosities in a traveling circus, a long time ago.Tambow is irrepressible, full of bounce and lovable charm. One day when Marvelloâ€™s Magical Circus is travelling across a lonely moor, an accident occurs, breaking the bars on their cage. Freedom beckons. Seizing the opportunity, Tambow and Wombi are launched on a journey full of humour and excitement, danger and dark moments, as they escape from the circus and follow their adventurous quest to try and find their way back to their homeland. Swept up in the story, the reader travels with the two and delights in the unexpected conclusion.Visit www.tambowthewombat.com for a peak inside!
author: Charles    Lamb
